title: What would be the greatest technology advancement in the coming years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quantum computing, medical cybernetics, especially as it applies to reconnecting severed spinal cords, flexible displays that can be used like cloth, genetic repair, ultra high speed wireless communication, ubiquitous voice recognition, combine those two to create a real internet of everything (think: ask your wristwatch "is my car in the driveway?" and it will say "yes" or "no"). I could go on, there are so many things.

Probably Google’s achievement in beating the world's best GO player. Beating someone at GO doesn't only require computational thinking but also imagination. Scientists have thought that the feat to beat someone at GO was at least decades away but it only happened this year. It is an exciting development for AI but also a very scary one. The potential is limitless but so are the dangers (assuming that full General AI could ever be achieved) .
